advancements.l2hostility.hostility.breed: Use a trait item on mobs
advancements.l2hostility.hostility.effec: Use poison/wither/soul flame effect or fire on mobs with Adaptive and kill it
Use curse effect on mobs with Regeneration and kill it
Use incarceration effect on mobs with Teleport and kill it
Use curse effect on mobs with Undying and kill it
advancements.l2hostility.hostility.glass: Obtain Detector Glasses to find out invisible mobs
advancements.l2hostility.hostility.kill_: Kill a mob with Protection, Regeneration, Tanky, and Adaptive Trait
Kill a mob with Dementor and Dispell Trait
Kill a mob with Killer Aura and Ragnarok Trait
Kill a mob with Protection and Tanky Trait
enchantment.l2hostility.insulator.desc: Reduce trait effects that pulls or pushes you
enchantment.l2hostility.split_suppressor: Disable Split trait on enemies on hit
enchantment.l2hostility.vanish.desc: This item vanishes when on ground or in hand of survival / adventure player
l2hostility.command.player.fail: Command has no target or no effect
l2hostility.command.player.trait_cap: The max rank %s has killed is rank %s
l2hostility.command.region.get_base: Target section has base difficulty level %s
l2hostility.command.region.get_total: Target section has total difficulty level %s
l2hostility.configuration.abrahadabraExt: Number of level to add when using Abrahadabra
l2hostility.configuration.adaptFactor: Damage factor for Adaptive. Higher means less reduction
l2hostility.configuration.allowBypassMin: Allow difficulty clearing bypass mob minimum level
l2hostility.configuration.allowNoAI: Allow mobs without AI to have levels
l2hostility.configuration.allowPlayerAll: Allow mobs allied to player to have levels
l2hostility.configuration.allowSectionDi: Allow chunk section to accumulate difficulty
l2hostility.configuration.allowTraitOnOw: Keep traits on mobs tamed by player
l2hostility.configuration.auraEffectAppl: Interval for aura effect traits to apply
l2hostility.configuration.banBottles: Ban drinking bottle of curse and sanity
l2hostility.configuration.bookOfReprintS: When using book of reprint to copy books, drop extra on player and does not allow overstacking
l2hostility.configuration.bottleOfCurseL: Number of level to add when using bottle of curse
l2hostility.configuration.corrosionDamag: Damage bonus when nothing to corrode
l2hostility.configuration.corrosionDurab: Fraction of remaining durability to corrode, per trait rank
l2hostility.configuration.counterStrikeD: Interval in ticks for Counter Strike
l2hostility.configuration.counterStrikeR: Range in blocks for Counter Strike
l2hostility.configuration.deathDecayDime: On player death, clear dimension penalty
l2hostility.configuration.deathDecayTrai: On player death, reduce max trait spawned by 1
l2hostility.configuration.defaultLevelBa: Default dimension base difficulty for mod dimensions
l2hostility.configuration.defaultLevelSc: Default dimension difficulty scale for mod dimensions
l2hostility.configuration.defaultLevelVa: Default dimension difficulty variation for mod dimensions
l2hostility.configuration.dementorDamage: Damage Bonus Factor for dementor-affected damage

Example: 0.5 means +2% per level damage bonus becoming +1% per level
 Default: 0.5
 Range: 0.0 ~ 1.0

Non-Magic damage will take a log with base of this config number
Example: 1.1 means 100 -> 48, 1000 -> 72
Example: 2 means 16 -> 4, 1024 -> 10
Example: 10 means 100 -> 2, 1000000 -> 6
 Default: 2.0
 Range: 1.01 ~ 100.0
l2hostility.configuration.disableHostili: Disable curio requirement for hostility loot
l2hostility.configuration.dispellDamageF: Damage Bonus Factor for enchantment bypassing damage

Example: 0.5 means +2% per level damage bonus becoming +1% per level
 Default: 0.5
 Range: 0.0 ~ 1.0
l2hostility.configuration.dispellDamageR:
Magic damage will take a log with base of this config number
Example: 1.1 means 100 -> 48, 1000 -> 72
Example: 2 means 16 -> 4, 1024 -> 10
Example: 10 means 100 -> 2, 1000000 -> 6
 Default: 2.0
 Range: 1.01 ~ 100.0
l2hostility.configuration.dispellTime: Duration in ticks for enchantments to be disabled per level for Dispell
l2hostility.configuration.distanceFactor: Difficulty bonus per block from origin
l2hostility.configuration.drainDamage: Damage bonus for each negative effects
l2hostility.configuration.drainDurationM: Max duration boost for negative effects
l2hostility.configuration.dropRateFromSp: Drop rate of hostility loot from mobs from spawner
l2hostility.configuration.drownedTrident: Chance per level for drowned to hold trident
l2hostility.configuration.enableCurioChe: Enable curios checks whitelist for items such as ring of ocean, on only selected mobs to reduce lag
l2hostility.configuration.enableEntitySp: Allow entity specific difficulty configs to load
l2hostility.configuration.enableEquipmen: Allow datapack configs to add extra items and enchantments to entities
l2hostility.configuration.enableHostilit: Give player hostility orbs when upleveling difficulty
l2hostility.configuration.enableStructur: Allow structure specific difficulty configs to load
l2hostility.configuration.envyDropRate: Trait item drop rate per rank when using Curse of Envy
l2hostility.configuration.envyExtraLevel: Number of level to add when using Curse of Envy
l2hostility.configuration.equipmentDropR: Drop rate of equipments spawned via hostility
l2hostility.configuration.erosionDamage: Damage bonus when nothing to erode
l2hostility.configuration.erosionDurabil: Fraction of lost durability to erode, per trait rank
l2hostility.configuration.fieryTime: Duration in seconds to set target on fire by Fiery
l2hostility.configuration.flameThornTime: Time in ticks of Soul Flame to inflict
l2hostility.configuration.globalApplyCha: Chance for health/damage bonus and trait to apply

Not applicable to mobs with minimum level.
 Default: 1.0
 Range: 0.0 ~ 1.0
l2hostility.configuration.globalTraitCha:
Not applicable to mobs with minimum level.
 Default: 1.0
 Range: 0.0 ~ 1.0
l2hostility.configuration.globalTraitSup: Chance to stop adding traits after adding a trait

Not applicable to mobs with minimum level.
 Default: 0.1
 Range: 0.0 ~ 1.0
l2hostility.configuration.glowingRangeHi: Detector Glasses glowing range for hidden mobs
l2hostility.configuration.glowingRangeNe: Detector Glasses glowing range for nearby mobs
l2hostility.configuration.gluttonyBottle: Bottle of Curse drop rate per level when using Curse of Gluttony
l2hostility.configuration.greedDropFacto: Hostility loot drop factor when using Curse of Greed
l2hostility.configuration.greedExtraLeve: Number of level to add when using Curse of Greed
l2hostility.configuration.grenadeDamageF: Damage Bonus Factor for grenade damage

Example: 0.5 means +2% per level damage bonus becoming +1% per level
 Default: 0.25
 Range: 0.0 ~ 1.0
l2hostility.configuration.hostilitySpawn: Number of mobs to spawn in Hostility Spawner
Level bonus factor for mobs to spawn in Hostility Spawner
l2hostility.configuration.initialTraitCh: Mobs at Lv.N will have N x k% chance to have trait

Default k% = 0.01, so Lv.N mobs with have N% chance to have trait
Mobs with entity config and trait chance of 1 will not be affected
 Default: 0.01
 Range: 0.0 ~ 1.0
l2hostility.configuration.insulatorFacto: Insulator Enchantment factor for reducing pushing
l2hostility.configuration.keepInventoryR: Allow KeepInventory to keep difficulty as well
l2hostility.configuration.killerAuraDama: Damage Bonus Factor for killer aura damage

Example: 0.5 means +2% per level damage bonus becoming +1% per level
 Default: 0.5
 Range: 0.0 ~ 1.0
l2hostility.configuration.killsPerLevel: Difficulty increment takes this many kills of same level mob
l2hostility.configuration.lustExtraLevel: Number of level to add when using Curse of Lust
l2hostility.configuration.maxTraitCount: Max number of traits on mobs
l2hostility.configuration.newPlayerProte: Mobs spawned within this range will use lowest player level in range instead of nearest player's level to determine mob level
l2hostility.configuration.nidhoggurCapAt: Cap drop at item max stack size
l2hostility.configuration.nidhoggurDropF: All loot drop factor when using Greed of Nidhoggur
l2hostility.configuration.nidhoggurExtra: Number of level to add when using Greed of Nidhoggur
l2hostility.configuration.orbRadius: Radius for Hostility Orb to take effect.
l2hostility.configuration.orbRadius.tool:
0 means 1x1x1 section, 1 means 3x3x3 sections, 2 means 5x5x5 sections
 Default: 2
 Range: 0 ~ 10
l2hostility.configuration.overHeadLevelC: Overhead level color in decimal form, converted from hex form
Overhead level color for mobs affected by abyssal thorn
l2hostility.configuration.overHeadRender: Overhead render text becomes full bright
Name plate render offset in lines, upward is positive
l2hostility.configuration.playerDeathDec: Decay in player difficulty on death
l2hostility.configuration.prideDamageBon: Damage bonus per level when using Curse of Pride
l2hostility.configuration.prideHealthBon: Health boost per level in percentage when using Curse of Pride
l2hostility.configuration.prideTraitFact: Trait cost multiplier when using Curse of Pride
l2hostility.configuration.ragnarokSealBa: Allow Ragnarok to seal items with Backpack in its id
l2hostility.configuration.ragnarokSealSl: Allow Ragnarok to seal curios items that adds curios slot
l2hostility.configuration.ragnarokTime: Seal time per level for Ragnarok
l2hostility.configuration.reflectFactor: Reflect factor per level for Reflect. 0.5 means reflect 50% damage (then scaled by level bonus)
l2hostility.configuration.regen: Regen rate for Regeneration trait per second per level
l2hostility.configuration.removeTraitChe: Interval for which traits check if they are banned and to be removed
l2hostility.configuration.reprintBypass: Reprint will gain Void Touch 20 and Vanishing Curse when it hits a mob with max Enchantment level of X or higher
l2hostility.configuration.reprintDamage: Reprint damage factor per enchantment point
l2hostility.configuration.ringOfCorrosio: Factor of maximum durability to cost for ring of corrosion
Penalty of maximum durability to cost for ring of corrosion
l2hostility.configuration.ringOfHealingR: Percentage of health to heal every second
l2hostility.configuration.ringOfLifeMaxD: Max percentage of max health a damage can hurt wearer of Ring of Life
l2hostility.configuration.ringOfReflecti: Radius in blocks for Ring of Reflection to work
l2hostility.configuration.selfEffectAppl: Interval for self effect traits to apply
l2hostility.configuration.showLevelOverH: Render mob level in name plate form
l2hostility.configuration.showOnlyWhenHo: Show nameplate style trait and name only when hovered
l2hostility.configuration.showTraitOverH: Render Traits in name plate form
l2hostility.configuration.soulBurnerTime: Duration in ticks for Soul Burner
l2hostility.configuration.speedy: Speed bonus for Speedy trait per level
l2hostility.configuration.splitDropRateF: Slimes hostility loot drop rate decay per split
l2hostility.configuration.tankArmor: Armor bonus for Tank trait per level
l2hostility.configuration.tankHealth: Health bonus for Tank trait per level
l2hostility.configuration.tankTough: Toughness bonus for Tank trait per level
l2hostility.configuration.title: L2Hostility Configuration
l2hostility.configuration.witchChargeMin: Minimum duration for witch charge to be effective, in ticks
l2hostility.configuration.witchWandFacto: Factor of effect duration for witch wand, to make up for splash decay
l2hostility.configuration.wrathDamageBon: Damage bonus per level difference when using Curse of Wrath
l2hostility.configuration.wrathExtraLeve: Number of level to add when using Curse of Wrath
l2hostility.info.title: Difficulty Information
l2hostility.item.book.copy: Merge it with enchanted book in anvil to copy.
l2hostility.item.book.everything_invalid: Name is not ID of an enchantment
l2hostility.item.book.everything_shift: Shift right click with it to turn it into a book with all enchantments obtainable from enchantment table.
l2hostility.item.book.everything_use: Rename this item with ID of an enchantment obtainable from enchantment table, then right click to generate a book of that enchantment, costing player experience.
l2hostility.item.consumable.orb: Make %sx%sx%s chunk sections no longer spawn mobs with levels.
l2hostility.item.equipment.abrahadabra: When a mob trait tries to apply a trait effect on you, apply it to surrounding enemies that target you instead.
l2hostility.item.equipment.abyssal_thorn: Mobs get all possible traits at their level, but with Curse of Envy, they will always drop trait symbols of those when killed
l2hostility.item.equipment.curse_no_drop: Mobs you kill will not drop hostility loot
l2hostility.item.equipment.curse_of_envy: Get trait items when you kill mobs with traits, with a chance of %s%% per trait rank
l2hostility.item.equipment.curse_of_glut: Get Bottle of Curse when you kill mobs with level, with a chance of %s%% per level
l2hostility.item.equipment.curse_of_lust: Mobs you kill will drop all equipments
l2hostility.item.equipment.curse_of_prid: Gain %s%% health and %s%% attack damage per difficulty level
l2hostility.item.equipment.curse_of_slot: You will not gain difficulty by killing mobs
l2hostility.item.equipment.curse_of_wrat: Gain %s%% attack damage per difficulty level difference against mobs with higher level than you.
l2hostility.item.equipment.curse_trait_c: Mob traits will be +%s%% more frequent
l2hostility.item.equipment.detector: Shows player and regional difficulty information when held in hand / offhand
l2hostility.item.equipment.divinity_cros: Cleanse effect will not clear Lv.1 beneficial effects
l2hostility.item.equipment.divinity_ligh: Your adaptive level will stay at 0.
l2hostility.item.equipment.flame_thorn: When you damage a mob, inflict Soul Flame with level equals to total number of effects that mob has, for %ss
l2hostility.item.equipment.glasses: Allow you to see invisible mobs, and see mobs when you have blindness or darkness effects
l2hostility.item.equipment.imagine_break: All your melee damage bypass magical protection.
l2hostility.item.equipment.looting: Enables some hostility trait drops. Check JEI for detail.
l2hostility.item.equipment.nidhoggur: Mobs you kill will drop +%s%% loot per mob level
l2hostility.item.equipment.orb_use: Usable only when you hold [%s] in off hand and Equip [%s]
l2hostility.item.equipment.platinum_star: All your melee damage bypass damage cool down.
l2hostility.item.equipment.pocket_of_res: Automatically put sealed item inside, unseal it, and put it back when finished.
l2hostility.item.equipment.ring_of_corro: When you deal damage, damage all their equipments by %s%% of max durability.
When you take damage, damage all your equipments by %s%% of max durability.
l2hostility.item.equipment.ring_of_divin: Immune to magic damage. Gets permanent Cleanse effect
l2hostility.item.equipment.ring_of_heali: Heals %s%% of max health every second.
l2hostility.item.equipment.ring_of_incar: When sneaking, apply Incarceration effect on you and all mobs within your attack range.
l2hostility.item.equipment.ring_of_life: You will not lose more than %s%% of your max health at once
l2hostility.item.equipment.ring_of_refle: When a mob trait tries to apply a negative effect on you, apply it to surrounding enemies that target you instead.
l2hostility.item.equipment.section_rende: Hold [%s] and Equip [%s] to see regions cleared of hostility
l2hostility.item.equipment.witch_wand: Throw random splash potions on right click. Types selected from random potion traits.
l2hostility.item.spawner: Summon strong mobs. Kill them all to make a chunk section no longer spawn mobs with levels
l2hostility.item.wand.adder: Right click blocks to select trait. Right click mobs to select trait rank. Press shift to select in opposite direction.
l2hostility.item.wand.ai: Right click to remove or restore mob AI.
l2hostility.item.wand.equipment: Right click to open mob equipment menu. Shift right click to open mob curios menu.
l2hostility.item.wand.target: Right click 2 mobs to make them fight each other.
l2hostility.jei.envy: Drops when you equips Curse of Envy while killing mobs of this trait
l2hostility.jei.gluttony: Drops when you equips Curse of Gluttony while killing mobs with levels
l2hostility.jei.min_health: Drops on mobs with %s or higher max health
l2hostility.jei.min_level: Drops on mobs with level %s or higher
l2hostility.jei.no_trait: %s chance to drop when conditions met
l2hostility.jei.required: Requires you to equip %s while killing mobs
l2hostility.msg.err_disallow: Trait not applicable on this entity
l2hostility.msg.err_max: Trait level already reached max value
l2hostility.msg.set_trait: Set trait %1$s on entity %2$s to level %3$s
l2hostility.patchouli.landing: Welcome to Champion-like difficulty scaling mod
l2hostility.patchouli.title: L2Hostility Guide
l2hostility.title: L2Hostility
l2hostility.tooltip.disable: %s enchantments disabled for %ss. Any new enchantment will vanish.
l2hostility.tooltip.shift: Press SHIFT to show spawn condition
l2hostility.tooltip.witch_bottle: Increase duration of all effects longer than %ss by %s%%. At most increase to %ss.
l2hostility.tooltip.witch_charge: Right click to fire. When hit entity, increase duration of all harmful effects longer than %ss by %s%%. At most increase to %ss.
l2hostility.tooltip.witch_eternal: Right click to fire. When hit entity, all harmful effects longer than %ss becomes infinite duration.
patchouli.l2hostility.landing: Find out the mechanics and mob traits to know what to prepare for
patchouli.l2hostility.title: L2Hostility Guide
trait.l2hostility.adaptive.desc: Memorize damage types taken and stack %s%% damage reduction for those damage every time. Memorizes last %s different damage types.
trait.l2hostility.arena.desc: Players around it cannot place or break blocks. Immune damage from entities not affected by this.
trait.l2hostility.corrosion.desc: When hit target, randomly picks %s equipments and increase their durability loss by %s. When there aren't enough equipments, increase damage by %s per piece
trait.l2hostility.counter_strike.desc: After attacked, it will attempt to perform a counter strike.
trait.l2hostility.dementor.desc: Resistant to physical damage. Damage bypass armor.
trait.l2hostility.dispell.desc: Resistant to magic damage. Damage bypass magical protections. Randomly picks %s enchanted equipment and disable enchantments on them for %s seconds.
trait.l2hostility.drain.desc: Grants a random potion trait with same level. When hit target, remove %s beneficial effects, deal %s more damage for every harmful effects, and increase their duration by %s. At most increase to %ss.
trait.l2hostility.erosion.desc: When hit target, randomly picks %s equipments and reduce their durability by %s. When there aren't enough equipments, increase damage by %s per piece
trait.l2hostility.fiery.desc: Ignite attacker and attack target for %s seconds. Makes mob immune to fire.
trait.l2hostility.gravity.desc: Increase gravity for mobs around it. Knock attackers downward when damaged.
trait.l2hostility.grenade.desc: Shoot explosive bullets every %s seconds after the previous bullet disappears.
trait.l2hostility.growth.desc: Slime will grow larger when at full health. Automatically gain Regenerate trait.
trait.l2hostility.killer_aura.desc: Deal %s magic damage to players and entities targeting it within %s blocks and apply trait effects for every %ss
trait.l2hostility.master.desc: Summons minions around the mob. Some minions will protect master.
trait.l2hostility.moonwalk.desc: Decrease gravity for mobs around it
trait.l2hostility.pulling.desc: Mob will pull entities hostile to it within %s blocks.
trait.l2hostility.ragnarok.desc: When hit target, randomly picks %s equipments and seal them, which takes %ss to unseal.
trait.l2hostility.reflect.desc: Reflect direct physical damage as %s%% magical damage
trait.l2hostility.regenerate.desc: Heals %s%% of full health every second.
trait.l2hostility.repelling.desc: Mob will push away entities hostile to it within %s blocks, and immune to projectiles.
trait.l2hostility.reprint.desc: Mob will copy target enchantments, and deal %s more damage per enchantment point
trait.l2hostility.shulker.desc: Shoot bullets every %s seconds after the previous bullet disappears.
trait.l2hostility.split.desc: When mob dies, it will split into 2 of itself with half levels but same trait. This trait reduce by 1 when split.
trait.l2hostility.teleport.desc: Mob will attempt to teleport to avoid physical damage and track targets.
trait.l2hostility.undying.desc: Mob will heal to full health every time it dies.
